description:
Job Description

Warehouse General Labor – We are immediately hiring 52 Warehouse General Laborers to load and unload trucks, scan, pick and pack products, as well as process inbound and outbound shipments at a large distribution center in the South Gate, CA area.

EARN $16 - $16.50 AN HOUR

FULL-TIME WORK! WEEKLY PAY!

WORK DAYS OR NIGHTS!

The company offers many perks and benefits including:

  • Free onsite parking.
  • Sick pay.
  • Direct deposit.
  • An employee break room with a microwave, refrigerator, and vending machines.
  • Company-provided personal protection equipment.
  • Added bonuses and much more!

You will work Sunday to Wednesday OR Wednesday to Sunday. Choose your shift:

  • Day Shift: 5am – 3:30pm ($16 per hour)
  • Night Shift: 5pm – 3:30am ($16.50 per hour)

To qualify for these general labor positions, you must have at least 6 months of prior warehouse experience and:

  • Be able to work overtime on short notice.
  • Have steel-toed boots to wear to work.
  • Have a flexible schedule.

If you are reliable and seek steady full-time work, then APPLY NOW for immediate consideration. Or call: 310-362-0647 for more information.
